    • Method Detail

      • transitionFunction

        public abstract AbstractParticle transitionFunction(SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractTransitionParameter parameter)
        The deterministic transition function, i.e. s=f''(s). Note: this function is available only when the random component (v) can be separated out: s=f(s, v)=f'( f''(s), v ).
        Parameters:
        parameter - the static parameter
        Returns:
        the system state at next time point given the current state

      • transitionModel

        public abstract AbstractParticle transitionModel(SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractTransitionParameter parameter,
                               SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractTransitionRandomComponent random)
        The common transition model: s=f(s, v).
        Parameters:
        parameter - the static parameter
        random - the random component
        Returns:
        the system state at next time point given the current state

      • transitionPdf

        public abstract java.math.BigDecimal transitionPdf(AbstractParticle nextState)
        The transition probability density function.
        Parameters:
        nextState - the next system state
        Returns:
        the probability density of p(s_t+1 | s_t ), s_t is the current state, s_t+1 is the nextState

      • measurementFunction

        public abstract SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurement measurementFunction(SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurementParameter parameter)
        The deterministic measurement function, i.e. m=g''(s). Note: this function is available only when the random component (w) can be separated out: n=g(s, w)=g'( g''(s), w ).
        Parameters:
        parameter - the static parameter (e.g.: sensor locations)
        Returns:
        the measurement given the current state

      • measurementModel

        public abstract SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurement measurementModel(SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurementParameter parameter,
                                                        SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurementRandomComponent random)
        The common measurement model: m=g(s, w).
        Parameters:
        parameter - the static parameter (e.g.: sensor locations)
        random - the random component
        Returns:
        the measurement given the current state

      • measurementPdf

        public abstract java.math.BigDecimal measurementPdf(SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurement measurement)
        The measurement probability density function.
        Parameters:
        measurement - the measurement
        Returns:
        the probability density of measurement distribution

      • proposalPdf

        public abstract java.math.BigDecimal proposalPdf(AbstractParticle nextState,
                               SMC.AbstractParticle.AbstractMeasurement measurement)
        The proposal probability density function.
        Parameters:
        nextState - the next system state
        measurement - the measurement
        Returns:
        the probability density of proposal distribution
